the denot semant of program languag thi paper is atutori introduct to the theori of program languag semant developby d scott and c strachei the applic of thetheori to formal languag specif is demonstr and other applicar survei the first languag consid loop is veri elementariand it definit mere introduc the notat and methodolog ofthe approach then the semant concept of environ store andcontinu ar introduc to model class of program languag featurand the underli mathemat theori of comput due to scottis motiv and outlin final the paper present a formaldefinit of the languag gedanken cacm august 1976 tennent rd semant program languag applic imper environ store continu theoriof comput higher order function recurs definit loop gedanken 422 5 24 ca760802 jb januari 4 1978 10 33am 1024 4 2842 1051 4 2842 1086 4 28421102 4 2842 1132 4 2842 1132 4 2842 12344 2842 1263 4 2842 1265 4 2842 1270 42842 1323 4 2842 1358 4 2842 1379 4 28421380 4 2842 1390 4 2842 1453 4 2842 14644 2842 1484 4 2842 1486 4 2842 1491 42842 1498 4 2842 1549 4 2842 1613 4 28421614 4 2842 1706 4 2842 1781 4 2842 18254 2842 1826 4 2842 1860 4 2842 1878 42842 378 4 2842 2060 4 2842 2083 4 28422155 4 2842 2155 4 2842 2168 4 2842 21784 2842 2179 4 2842 2252 4 2842 2294 42842 2314 4 2842 2317 4 2842 2325 4 28422326 4 2842 2341 4 2842 2457 4 2842 25464 2842 2558 4 2842 2645 4 2842 2652 42842 2684 4 2842 2719 4 2842 2723 4 28422838 4 2842 2842 4 2842 2842 4 2842 28424 2842 2842 4 2842 2842 4 2842 2855 42842 2879 4 2842 2903 4 2842 2929 4 28422934 4 2842 3069 4 2842 3077 4 2842 30774 2842 3080 4 2842 3106 4 2842 3150 42842 627 4 2842 669 4 2842 679 4 2842691 4 2842 761 4 2842 106 4 2842 9494 2842 989 4 2842 210 5 2842 2060 52842 2148 5 2842 2192 5 2842 2837 5 28422842 5 2842 2842 5 2842 2842 5 2842 31505 2842 3184 5 2842 2060 6 2842 2704 62842 2784 6 2842 2842 6 2842 2842 6 28422939 6 2842 2940 6 2842 2941 6 2842 29436 2842 3073 6 2842 3148 6 2842
